TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ArrayModelBinderProvider extends System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelBinderProvider

Docs.summary: Provides a model binder for arrays.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.ModelBinding.IModelBinder GetBinder (System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelBindingExecutionContext modelBindingExecutionContext, System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelBindingContext bindingContext);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.ModelBinding.IModelBinder GetBinder(class System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelBindingExecutionContext modelBindingExecutionContext, class System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelBindingContext bindingContext) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a model binder for arrays.
Docs.returns: A model binder object, or if the attempt to get a model binder is unsuccessful.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The attempt to get a model binder will be unsuccessful if the model is read-only, if the model is not an array type, or if the value provider's <xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.IValueProvider.ContainsPrefix%2A> method returns `false`.
